Control Name: PERF 8.3 Identify how tradeoﬀs impact customers and eﬃciency
Control Statement: When evaluating performance-related improvements, determine which choices will impact your customers and workload eﬃciency. For example, if using a key-value data store increases system performance, it is important to evaluate how the eventually consistent nature of it will impact customers.

control_attributes.Control: PERF 8.3 Identify how tradeoﬀs impact customers and eﬃciency
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you use tradeoﬀs to improve performance?
